event.title: the early 1920s when prospective investors were looking

data.event: The history of Miami can be dated back to the early 1920s when prospective investors were looking over plans for a new real estate development called ‘Miami Shore’ at North Burleigh.
They could also stay in the Hotel Miami which opened in 1925 by E. H. Berry.
The Miami State High School opened in 1963.

event.title: 1988 music video for the top-10 song "Two Strong Hearts" was filmed

data.event: Australian Musician John Farnham's 1988 music video for the top-10 song "Two Strong Hearts" was filmed outside the famous "Miami Ice" factory at 2015 Gold Coast Highway, Miami.
At the 2011 Australian Census the suburb recorded a population of 6,364.
